metadata.dc:author: Milano Manso, G
Martínez Valverde, M
Calvo Macías, C
Baca Cots, M
metadata.dc:description: Authors study seven young infants suffering from apneic spells, without clear origin. Diagnosis was gastroesophageal reflux in the two most torpid evolution: others had hyponatremia. RVS infection, inborn cytomegaly and prematurity apnea.
metadata.dc:title: Pausas de apnea en el lactante: estudio de siete casos.
[Apnea attacks in infants: study of 7 cases].
